function.name: setForces
function.description: Set the number and/or owner of forces on a planet

coordinates.description: Hex coordinates in format like '0,0' or '1,-1'

amount.description: New amount of forces. Omit or use -1 to keep existing number

player.description: New owner's game player ID. Omit or use -1 to keep existing owner

function.name: grantTech
function.description: Grant a technology to a player

techId.description: The ID of the technology to grant

player.description: Target player's game player ID. Use -1 for current player

function.name: removeTech
function.description: Remove a technology from a player

techId.description: The ID of the technology to remove

player.description: Target player's game player ID. Use -1 for current player

function.name: setTechExhausted
function.description: Set the exhausted state of a player's technology

techId.description: The ID of the technology to modify

player.description: Target player's game player ID. Use -1 for current player

exhausted.description: Whether the tech should be exhausted (true) or ready (false)

function.name: setPlanetExhausted
function.description: Set the exhausted state of a planet

coordinates.description: Hex coordinates in format like '0,0' or '1,-1'

exhausted.description: Whether the planet should be exhausted (true) or ready (false)

function.name: setPlayerTurn
function.description: Set which player's turn it is

player.description: Target player's game player ID to set as current turn player. Use -1 for current context player

science.description: The new science value for the player

player.description: Target player's game player ID. Use -1 for current player

vp.description: The new victory points value for the player

player.description: Target player's game player ID. Use -1 for current player
